title: Looking for team/members for a team to play ranked.
body: Have been playing this game for many many years and would love to knuckle down with a ranked team and play for fun/serious. Competent in top,jungle and mid.

replies.body:
Hi, if you're looking for a high-elo ranked team, I'm putting one together:
https://www.reddit.com/r/TeamRedditTeams/comments/7t9eeu/oced4starting_a_competitive_team/
Yoo, add me so we can play a few matches
